subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: The road now followed by today’s golfers, from amateur to pro to V.I.P., is the one paved by Walter Hagen, who won his first United States Open 100 years ago.
snippet: The road now followed by today’s golfers, from amateur to pro to V.I.P., is the one paved by Walter Hagen, who won his first United States Open 100 years ago.
